column6: "BROTHERS & KEEPERS (ADELPHOITE PHYLAXES)" PART 1 (OF 5) Haunted by his personal failures, Captain America comes to suspect that he has been under psychological attack from the rogue Navy Intelligence unit that created the so-called "Anti-Cap" Super Sailo
column8: | penciller:Joe Bennett | colorist:Transparency Digital | inker:Jack Jadson | writer:Christopher Priest | letterer:Dave Sharpe
